span.p: This action represents the matching of a trigger code to one of the values in the eRSD value sets.

span.p: This action represents the initial creation of the eICR.

td.span: eICR construction delay (x hours) - time after trigger event before an eICR should be created.

span.p: This action represents the periodic update of the eICR.

td.span: eICR periodic update (y hours) – the time after an initial eICR transmission to send a new eICR as an update during long encounters.

span.p: This action represents the close out of an eICR encounter.

td.span: eICR encounter close out (z hours) – the time after the end of the encounter to create the final eICR when there have been one or more trigger events.
